instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message: Hello, have a 820-3332, the Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process. But i can boot all the way to OS in safe mode (holding shift during boot) and run without issues. Confirmed GPU_vcore present. About to replace GPU but need to confirm nothing else could be the issue.

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message: First reflow U8900, untill all pins resolder.

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message: I went ahead and just replaced U8900. Still has same symptoms.

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message:
Now reflow GMUX.
After that, reflash BIOS, with clean ME.

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message: Thank you. Will reflow GMUX tomorrow morning. I did perform the clean ME bios flash previously with the same result.

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message:
Are you sure about clean ME?
Where did you get it?

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message:
Regarding ME: I use CMIZapper Medusa 2 to clean the ME region, Also, used a Matt Card for this specific board to confirm.

Regarding the GMUX, the 820-3332 doesn't have this chip. Are you referring to the eDP Mux U9100? In which case, i did reflow that one as well. 

Still same symptoms. Can only boot completely in safe mode.

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message: Then should be GPU internal issue...

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message: When replacing GPU, after replacement, are there any post activity that I need to do like load a clean ME region?

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message:
If you get the real/correct chip, it should work without any changes.
ME Region is related/married with PCH...

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message: Any tips on setting up the temp profile for the rework station. This will be my first time using a rework station (ACHI IR6500). I'm currently doing some reading on how-to. Going to try it out on some test boards first, once i get the profile setup

threads.title: 820-3332: Progress bar loads about half way, then reboots and repeats this process
threads.message:
There is no universal profile.
You must practice on scrap boards and adjust settings according with your machine power and ambient.
As a tip, when rework AMD give a bit more heat to bottom side, than for Nvidia.
AMD Si die is more sensitive than Nvidia...
